title: Internet is literally messing with me ?
body: Like... I play a game everythings fine alright... starts another game champion select is all fine ALRIGHT! then when the game ''starts'' I cant join. literally cant join ive even tried to join using my LTE . so far its been the fifth time. them leaverbusters are realy annoying I dont even know what the problem is... if my internet is at cause, why am I not getting disconnected from champion select? make no sens.. HELP :c

replies.body:
The champ select servers are different than the game servers, so while you may not have issues connecting to one, the other could be impeded. I strongly recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if you run into any further issues after taking those steps.
